Back to Olivier Messiaen

Olivier Messiaen

Morceau de lecture à vue

1934

Yvonne Loriod made an arrangement of this piece for ondes Martenot and piano, which was published under Messiaen’s name as the second of the Feuillets inédits.

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 2.5
